div.p: Grace of the Son be with you.

They were standing... [in] readiness, they did not want to wait for the lady to write. Therefore, she greets you and Gwalther along with the brothers. These are the news: they say the Emperor is dead and Philip of Spain is approaching Germany with a large army. The church in Richenweiler is expecting a new visitor, Doctor Jakob Andreae Schmidli. O holy visitation! Farewell.
To the highly learned Mr. Heinrich Bullinger in Zurich, etc.
